settings.title: Order & Win
settings.desc: Place an order for a chance to win exciting prizes.
settings.text1:
By participating in the Promotion, you are agreeing to these Terms and Conditions.

1. The Promoter
1.1 The Promoter is: Ulike UK (https://uk.ulike.com/)

2. The Promotion
2.1 The title of the promotion is "Ulike Valentine's Day Giveaway"

3. Key Conditions of the Promotion
3.1 The Promotion offers participants a chance to enter a prize draw if they (i) purchase a new Ulike IPL model ("Qualifying Product") during the period 31st January 2025 (GMT) to 14th February 2025 (GMT) (the "Promotion Period"); (ii) purchase any Ulike IPL product during the period 31st January 2025 (GMT) to 14th February 2025 (GMT) (the "Entry Period").
3.2 The Promoter will conduct a prize draw during the Entry Period. Winners for the 1st and 2nd prizes will be announced on the campaign page on 8th and 14th February 2025. Winners of the 3rd and 4th prizes will not be announced publicly on the website. Winners will be randomly selected from all eligible entries to receive the prizes, as detailed in Section 5 of these Terms and Conditions.

4. Eligibility Requirements
Eligibility Requirements
4.1 The Promotion is open to UK residents aged eighteen (18) or over.
4.2 The Promotion is not open to employees of the Promoter, its holding or subsidiary companies, anyone involved in the Promotion's administration, agents, or immediate family or household members of such individuals.
4.3 This is a consumer-only Promotion. Purchases made on a trade or wholesale basis are excluded.
4.4 Purchases of accessories, ex-display items, seconds, or replacements are excluded from the Promotion.
4.5 This offer cannot be combined with other offers, promotions, or voucher codes from the Promoter or its Group during the Promotion Period.
4.6 By entering the Promotion, participants confirm eligibility and represent that all information provided is complete, honest, and genuine.
4.7 The Promoter may request proof of eligibility and identity.

5. How to Enter
5.1. To enter the Promotion, you must first purchase a Qualifying Product during the Promotion Period at [https://uk.ulike.com/].
5.2. All steps must be completed by the end of the Entry Period.
5.2. Proof of purchase may be requested by the Promoter. This must be an original purchase receipt for a Qualifying Product within the Promotion Period. Deposit receipts or order confirmations are not accepted.
5.3. Only entries with all required steps completed by the end of the Entry Period will be considered, and prizes will only be issued to successful entries.
5.4. Winners will be randomly selected, with review content having no impact on winning chances unless an entry breaches these Terms and Conditions.
5.7. Only participants who purchase a Qualifying Product during the Promotion Period are eligible to participate in the Promotion.

6. The Prize Draws
The Prize Draws
6.1. Prizes will be awarded daily during the Entry Period. Winners for the 1st and 2nd prizes will be announced on the campaign page on 8th and 15th February 2025. Winners for the 3rd and 4th prizes will be notified daily via email.

  • 1 x iPhone 16 Pro Max 256GB (Worth £1,199.00)
  • 1 x iPad Air 13-inch 128GB (Worth £799.00)
  • 100 x UV Sterilizers (Worth £70.00 each)
  • 300 x Razors (Worth £15.00 each)

6.2. Each entry that meets the criteria in Section 5 ('How to Enter') will automatically qualify for the daily prize draw. Winners will be selected through a random drawing process.
6.3. The Promoter will notify winners via email or phone using the contact information provided in their entry. Winners of physical prizes (1st, 2nd, and 3rd prizes) must confirm their acceptance and provide the necessary delivery details within thirty (30) days.
6.4. The Promoter will require you to provide full name, address, phone number, email address, details of a valid Ulike product order proof, order email, and purchase date for the Qualifying Product you have purchased.
6.5. If a winner fails to respond or does not provide the required information within the 7 days, the Promoter reserves the right to forfeit the prize and select a new winner.
6.6. The Promoter is not responsible for incorrect or out-of-date contact information provided by entrants. Prizes sent to an incorrect address due to such errors will only be reissued if returned to the Promoter.
6.7. The Promoter will not accept returns or refunds on Qualifying Products during the Promotion Period once a prize has been delivered unless the prize is returned along with the Qualifying Product.

7. The Prizes
7.1. Prizes in the Prize Catalogue are non-transferable and subject to availability. The Promoter reserves the right to substitute prizes with similar items of equal or greater value. No cash alternative will be offered.
7.2. Prizes include delivery within mainland UK (excluding Northern Ireland and the Scottish Highlands). Additional costs are not covered.
7.3. Prizes will be dispatched within thirty (30) days of winner selection and entry verification.

8. General Terms and Conditions
8.1. The Promoter is not liable for lost, delayed, or misdirected entries due to technical failures, except in cases of negligence by the Promoter.
8.2. The Promoter is not responsible for entries that cannot be verified due to incomplete or incorrect information.
8.3. These Terms and Conditions do not affect statutory rights, including the right to return faulty products.

9. Data Protection
9.1. The Promoter is the data controller for personal data collected in this Promotion, which will be used solely for administering the Promotion, verifying entries, and fulfilling claims.
9.2. The Promoter may use third-party services (such as Bazaarvoice, Inc.) to process data.
9.3. Refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on data processing related to this Promotion.

10. Publicity
10.1. The Promoter may publish winners’ surnames and partial prefixes of an email address. If you object to such publishing, please contact the Promoter, who will still provide this information to the relevant authority upon request.

11. Intellectual Property
11.1. The Promoter does not claim ownership of any intellectual property rights in your submitted Review. You retain all copyright and other intellectual property rights in your Review. However, by participating in the Promotion, you grant the Promoter a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable license for the duration of any intellectual property rights in the Review, allowing the Promoter to use, display, publish, transmit, copy, edit, alter, store, re-format, and sub-license the Review for market research, Promotion administration, and general marketing purposes.

12. General
12.1. If the Promoter reasonably believes you have breached these terms and conditions, it reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to disqualify you from the Promotion or from using the online Promotion portal, including future promotions.
12.2. The Promoter reserves the right to suspend, cancel, or amend the Promotion and these Terms and Conditions as needed due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control or if deemed necessary.
12.3. These Terms and Conditions are governed by Hong Kong law, and the parties submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the Hong Kong International Arbitration Center (HKIAC) for arbitration in accordance with its then-applicable arbitration rules. Last updated on 31 January 2025.

settings.title: This Valentine’s Day, it's not just about the love you share with others, but also the love you show yourself.
settings.desc: Our hair removal device helps you feel smooth, confident, and ready to embrace every moment.

settings.text: Suitable for most skin tones and hair colours
settings.text1: IPL works by targeting melanin (pigment), so its effectiveness depends on the melanin levels in both the skin and hair. As a result, IPL may be less effective on lighter hair colors due to lower melanin levels, and it could pose safety concerns for darker skin tones, which absorb higher levels of energy due to their higher melanin content.
settings.text4: Note: IPL technology is most effective on dark hair and fair skin. It is least effective on blonde, grey, and red hair, and is not suitable for use on very dark skin.

settings.title: Ulike Air 3 Complete Care Kit
settings.desc: Our world-renowned IPL device for long-lasting results.

settings.title: Long-lasting hair removal from the comfort of home.

settings.text: Cheaper than razors, effective like laser.
settings.text2: Choose Ulike IPL for a convenient and cost-effective hair removal solution.
settings.text4: Safe for skin and no irritation
settings.text8: * Average U.S. hair removal expense, according to American Laser Center 2020 Report

settings.text1: Flashing every 0.5 seconds, it's ideal for maintenance treatments on larger areas and for quick touch-ups.
The perfect balance between power and flash speed, suitable for removing finer to normal hair on most body parts.
Best for removal of thicker, coarse hair in generally less sensitive areas such as arms, legs, chest, and back.
Delivers a powerful output of 26J per 4-pulse burst, effectively targeting resilient hair on areas like the armpits, chest, beard, and bikini line.

settings.text: Use your IPL in 3 easy steps.
settings.text2: Use the included razor to shave any hairs longer than 2 mm (1/16 in) in the treatment area.
settings.text4: Place the device flush against your skin to activate the contact sensor. Then press the treatment button to begin.
settings.video1: shopify://files/videos/使用步骤视频剪辑（第三步） (1).mov

settings.title: Trusted by over 7 million users worldwide.

settings.text: Chief Scientific Advisor of Ulike Group
settings.text2: “I am to merge the most important findings in photomedicine research with Ulike’s robust research and development capabilities to attain industry breakthroughs with advanced beauty products.”
“What was only possible in a clinic a few years ago has become an effective and safe option for patients to undertake at the convenience and privacy of their own home.”

settings.text: "It offers the best performance I could find at a very reasonable price: more for less."
"We love this IPL hair removal device that cools the skin and eliminates any irritation or risk of burns."
"Ulike has the best at-home IPL hair removal devices—totally worth the money."
"Comfortable and nearly painless to use. You'll become obsessed with the results."
"Best IPL hair removal device-comfortable, quick, and ultra-efficient."
"Less painful and more affordable than clinic laser hair removal."

settings.des: Source: Frost&Sullivan, confirmed based on research on global hair removal device market and calculated by 2023 global sales volume metrics. Hair removal device refers to a beauty instrument that targets hair follicles using technologies such as laser and intense pulsed light (IPL), with the aim of reducing or removing hair. The survey was completed in October 2024.

settings.text: Double the light. Twice the efficiency.
settings.text1: With Dual Lights, the Air 10 offers faster, more effective treatments and delivers visible results in as little as two weeks.
Maintaining a cool 25°C contact temperature, the Air 10 prevents burns and irritation, ensuring nearly painless hair removal even in sensitive areas like the bikini line.
Salon-inspired SHR Mode sets a new industry standard, eliminating even the most resilient, coarse hairs.

Our brand-new skin protection technology accurately detects skin tones, auto-adjusts treatment power, and stops flashing if the treatment area is deemed too dark for safe application — ensuring you remain worry-free and, of course, hair-free.

settings.text: Effortless hair removal in a flash.
settings.text1: Air 3 features our AutoGlide Mode, which delivers a quick flash every 0.7 seconds—without the need to press your thumb on any buttons. This means full-body hair removal sessions can take as little as 12 minutes!

The Air 3, equipped with our signature Sapphire Ice Cooling technology, maintains a comfortable 25°C during treatments, safeguarding your skin from burns while ensuring effective and efficient hair removal.
In less than 3 weeks of consistent treatments, you'll begin to see a visible reduction in hair growth.
After 8 weeks of consistent bi-weekly treatments, the hair follicles begin to shrink and the hair roots begin to fall out.
Most people will have achieved desired results by this stage, with their skin becoming smooth and hair-free.
* The specific results vary from person to person, and the use time can be extended according to the thickness of the hair until the desired results are achieved.

settings.title: From now to wow in just 2 weeks
settings.text: Experience the power of the Air 10 IPL hair removal device, delivering impressive results in just 2 weeks! Say goodbye to unwanted hair and embrace the confidence that comes with smoother skin – just in time for the holidays.
